Arrow.description: Used with <itemName id=|WeakerBow|/>. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Arrow_Fire.description: <itemName id=|Arrow|/>s for shooting with <itemName id=|Bow_Fire|/> and <itemName id=|BowGun_Fire|/>. Deals COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Fire damage. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Arrow_Poison.description: <itemName id=|Arrow|/>s for shooting with <itemName id=|Bow_Poison|/> and <itemName id=|BowGun_Poison|/>. It poisons any target it hits. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

AssaultRifleBullet.description: Ammo for <itemName id=|AssaultRifle_Default1|/> and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/> to craft.

BaseCampBattleDirector.description: Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base. Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies or focus entirely on work whenever you like.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth.description: Protects against cold nights. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth_Cold.description: <itemName id=|ClothArmor|/> produced in cold regions. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth_Heat.description: <itemName id=|ClothArmor|/> produced in hot regions. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur.description: Armor made from <itemName id=|Leather|/>. Its warmth and defense have been improved. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur_Cold.description: <itemName id=|FurArmor|/> produced in cold regions. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur_Heat.description: <itemName id=|FurArmor|/> produced in hot regions. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper.description: Armor made of metal. Somewhat heavy, but provides good defense. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper_Cold.description: Improved <itemName id=|CopperArmor|/>. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper_Heat.description: Improved <itemName id=|CopperArmor|/>. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron.description: Armor made from high quality metal. Quite heavy, but provides excellent defense. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron_Cold.description: Improved <itemName id=|IronArmor|/>. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron_Heat.description: Improved <itemName id=|IronArmor|/>. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal.description: Armor fully utilizing the latest technology. Boasts overwhelming defense. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal_Cold.description: Improved <itemName id=|StealArmor|/>. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal_Heat.description: Improved <itemName id=|StealArmor|/>. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic.description: Armor developed by pushing the edge of technology. Boasts unparalleled defense. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Cold.description: Improved <itemName id=|PlasticArmor|/>. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Heat.description: Improved <itemName id=|PlasticArmor|/>. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Weight.description: Improved <itemName id=|PlasticArmor|/>. Increases carrying capacity. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Defense_BowGun.description: Assign a Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability and it will protect a base using the crossbow.

Battle_Defense_MachineGun.description: Assign Pal to use the machine gun to protect a base.

Battle_Defense_Missile.description: Assign a Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability and it will protect a base using the missile launcher.

Battle_Glider_Grade_01.description: A glider for soaring through the air. Cheaply made, it isn't very fast.

Battle_Glider_Grade_02.description: A glider for soaring through the air. A mass produced commercial model, itâ€™s decently fast. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/>.

Battle_Glider_Grade_03.description: A glider for soaring through the air. With its capabilities improved, it can soar at high speed. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/>

Battle_Glider_Grade_04.description: A glider for soaring through the air. Its performance has been further improved, with increased speed and lift. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/>.

Battle_GunPowder_Grade_02.description: <itemName id=|Gunpowder2|/> used to fire ammunition. Required to make bullets. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/>.

Battle_Helm_Grade_02_Fur.description: A beautiful feathered headband. Though improbable, it somehow protects its wearer from lethal head injuries. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Workbench|/> to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_03_Copper.description: A helm made of metal. A reliable piece of armor that protects your head, and all the thoughts within. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_04_Iron.description: A helm made from high quality metal. Its sheen gives the wearer a greater sense of confidence. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_05_Steal.description: A helm made from <itemName id=|StealIngot|/>. Envied for its immaculate quality, it is proof of a chosen warrior. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_06_Plastic.description: Helmet made of <itemName id=|Plastic|/>. In addition to enhanced defense capabilities, its weight was also reduced. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/> to craft.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Bat.description: A <itemName id=|Bat|/> for close range combat. Can beat a small Pal to a pulp if need be.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Sword.description: <itemName id=|Sword|/> for close-range combat. The blade is extremely sharp! Mightier than a pen, for sure. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_AssaultRifle.description: Mows down enemies with overwhelming force. It excels at rapid-fire and is well suited to taking down powerful foes. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow1.description: Primitive long range weapon. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow3.description: An enhanced bow that allows three arrows to be fired simultaneously. By some strange mechanism, it only consumes a single <itemName id=|Arrow|/> when fired.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun.description: Fires an <itemName id=|Arrow|/> effortlessly. Though it takes time to load, it delivers a powerful shot. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun_Fire.description: A <itemName id=|BowGun|/> that deals COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Fire damage. Requires <itemName id=|Arrow_Fire|/>. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun_Poison.description: A <itemName id=|BowGun|/> that inflicts poison on its target. Requires <itemName id=|Arrow_Poison|/>. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow_Fire.description: A bow that deals COMMON_ELEMENT_NAME_Fire damage. Burns Pals with fire arrows, making them easier to capture. Requires <itemName id=|Arrow_Fire|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow_Poison.description: Frightening bow that poisons its target. Poisoned Pals are easier to capture. Requires <itemName id=|Arrow_Poison|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_GatlingGun.description: A Gatling Gun capable of rapid fire. Mows down enemies with suppressive fire. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_GrenadeLauncher.description: Fires grenades that cause wide-ranging explosions. Useful when dealing with a large number of enemies. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/>

Battle_RangeWeapon_GuidedMissileLauncher.description: Fires missiles that automatically track and pursue enemies. Missiles explode upon impact, causing damage over a wide area.

Battle_RangeWeapon_HandGun.description: A handgun with improved capacity and rapid-fire capabilities. Has more immediate firepower than a <itemName id=|MakeshiftHandgun|/>. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_HomingSphereLauncher.description: Fires Pal Spheres that automatically home in on Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_LaserRifle.description: A weapon that fires high-energy lasers. It has impressive firepower and is easy to handle. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Rifle.description: A single-shot rifle. Takes time to load. What it lacks in capacity, it makes up for with sheer power. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_RocketLauncher.description: A <itemName id=|Launcher_Default|/> that can fire a powerful round from long distances. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_ShotGun.description: Wreaks havoc at close range. Can fire twice before reloading. Despite the limited load capacity, it still packs a punch. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_ShotGun_Multi.description: A high capacity, powerful shotgun. It has outstanding close range DPS. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/>.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SphereLauncher.description: Innovative launcher that fires many Spheres simultaneously. Can easily capture a herd of Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/> to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SphereLauncher_Once.description: Can capture distant Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

BreedFarm.description: Assign a male and a female Pal to produce eggs. <itemName id=|Cake|/> is required for breeding.

BuildableGoddessStatue.description: Make offerings to enhance the stats of the Player and their Pals.

CeilingLamp.description: Lights up dark areas below at a base.

Cooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat.

Crusher.description: Facility for breaking down <itemName id=|Stone|/> and <itemName id=|Wood|/> to exchange them for other materials. Requires Pal with the Watering suitability to spin the water turbine.

DamagedScarecrow.description: Training dummy shaped like a Pengullet.

DecalGunSet.description: Decal gun set. Allows crafting of a strange gun that paints a Pal decal where it is fired. Required ammo also becomes craftable.

DefenseWait.description: Pals assigned to it will watch for approaching enemies.

DefenseWall.description: Large defensive wall that protects from enemy invasions.

DefenseWall_Metal.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

DefenseWall_Wood.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

DisplayCharacter.description: Container for observing captured Pals. Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production, but they do not become hungry.

ElecBaton.description: Close range weapon that sends out an electric jolt upon contact. Pals are easier to capture when electrocuted. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

ElectricCooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat. Improved range and cooling capabilities.

ElectricHeater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold. Improved range and heating capabilities.

FlourMill.description: Facility for milling <itemName id=|Wheat|/> to produce <itemName id=|Flour|/>. Requires Pal with the Watering suitability to spin the water turbine.

FurnitureSet_1.description: Decorative furniture set. Place furniture in your living space and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_10.description: Decorative furniture set. Place to keep somewhere off limits.

FurnitureSet_11.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

FurnitureSet_12.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

FurnitureSet_13.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_14.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_15.description: Decorative furniture set. Place in your base and dream about living a life of luxury.

FurnitureSet_16.description: Decorative furniture set. Essentially for making sure you look good.

FurnitureSet_17.description: Decorative furniture set. Place on a foundation in your base for that homey feel.

FurnitureSet_18.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives the air of luxury to your base.

FurnitureSet_19.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique desk.

FurnitureSet_2.description: Set of wooden cabinets that look at home in a tavern. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_20.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't actually be used to stay clean.

FurnitureSet_21.description: Antique storage furniture set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_22.description: Antique storage cabinet set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_23.description: Decorative furniture set. Doesn't actually tell time.

FurnitureSet_24.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique chair.

FurnitureSet_25.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't be used for its original purpose.

FurnitureSet_26.description: Decorative furniture set. Your Pals will keep on working.

FurnitureSet_27.description: Street lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity to light.

FurnitureSet_28.description: Brick fireplace set to provide illumination. Must be lit with fire.

FurnitureSet_29.description: Antique lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity to light.

FurnitureSet_3.description: Decorative furniture set. Set up a bar and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_30.description: Metal shelf set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_31.description: Decorative furniture set. Spruces up the outside of your base.

FurnitureSet_32.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives an air of stately elegance to your base.

FurnitureSet_4.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants on your base's walls for a splash of color.

FurnitureSet_5.description: Decorative furniture set. Not suitable for doing keg stands.

FurnitureSet_6.description: Container furniture set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_7.description: Decorative furniture set. Leather screams luxury.

FurnitureSet_8.description: Decorative furniture set. Apparently a priceless artifact in more civilized times.

FurnitureSet_9.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants around your base for a splash of color.

FurnitureSet_Japanese.description: Japanese-style decorative furniture set. Transform your base into a traditional Japanese haven.

Glass_houseset.description: Set for building bases using glass. Allows building of glass foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

HandTorch.description: Lights up dark areas and keeps you warm. Can also be used for close range combat in a pinch. Crafts <itemName id=|Torch|/> at<mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/>.

HandgunBullet.description: Ammo for <itemName id=|HandGun_Default|/> and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Heater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold.

Infra_ElectricGenerator_Grade_01.description: Electric Pals at the base can now store electricity, allowing the use of electric facilities.

Infra_ElectronicCircuit.description: <itemName id=|MachineParts2|/> required to create precision equipment. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/>.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_01.description: Used to store items. Place at a base and Pals with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Transport suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_02.description: Can be used to store more items. Pals with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Transport suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_03.description: Can be used to store even more items. Pals with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Transport suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_PalBed_Grade_01.description: Pals at base recover SAN when sleeping in beds at night. Without a bed, Pals cannot sleep soundly, and no SAN is recovered.

Infra_PalBed_Grade_02.description: Pals sleep more soundly, improving the amount of Health and SAN recovered while sleeping.

Infra_PlayerBed_Grade_01.description: Human bed. Sleeping restores Health. Sleep at night and time will pass until morning. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

Infra_PlayerBed_Grade_02.description: Soft bed with improved restorative capabilities. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

JapaneseStyle_houseset.description: Set for building bases using Japanese-style architecture. Allows building of Japanese-style foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Lamp.description: Lights up dark areas at a base.

LargeCeilingLamp.description: Lights up large areas below at a base.

LargeLamp.description: Lights up large areas at a base.

LauncherBullet.description: Ammo for the <itemName id=|Launcher_Default|/> and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_03|/> to craft.

Launcher_Meteor.description: A phenomenal weapon that fires a meteor. Upon striking its target, it creates an explosion similar to a meteorite impact. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_02|/>.

MakeshiftHandgun.description: A handgun created from spare parts. Relatively well suited for close quarters combat, but can only fire one shot before needing to reload. Crafted at <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/>.

MeatCutterKnife.description: Knife for butchering Pals. When equipped, the Pet command becomes Butcher. Butchered Pals will be gone for good.

Metal_Gate.description: Metal gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Metal_houseset.description: Set for building bases using metal. Allows building of metal foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

MonsterFarm.description: Farm for raising sheep-and fowl-like Pals. Assign a Pal with the appropriate traits to a farm to automatically produce items.

Musket.description: Simple, old fashioned gun. Fires a single, powerful shot at the expense of a long reload time. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

PALBOX.description: Facility for storing captured Pals. Pals inside gradually recover Health. The area around this structure will become your base.

PalFoodBox.description: Place food here, and Pals at the base will eat from it.

Product_Axe_Grade_01.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from stone, it's not very sharp.

Product_Axe_Grade_02.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from metal, its sharpness has improved. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Product_Axe_Grade_03.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from high quality metal, its sharpness has improved even further. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Product_Cooking_Grade_01.description: Used to make simple food or provide meager warmth and light.

Product_Cooking_Grade_02.description: Can efficiently prepare more varieties of foods.

Product_Cooking_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but can prepare high-quality food more efficiently. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_EmitFlame suitability.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_01.description: Produces faster than <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/>. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft trait.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but produces items at a faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft trait.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but produces items at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft trait.

Product_Farm_Berries.description: Can produce berries at a base. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Seeding, COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Watering, and COMMON_WORK_TYPE_CollectResourcePickable suitabilities.

Product_Farm_Lettuce.description: Farm for producing lettuce. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Seeding, COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Watering, and COMMON_WORK_TYPE_CollectResourcePickable suitabilities.

Product_Farm_tomato.description: Farm for producing tomatoes. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Seeding, COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Watering, and COMMON_WORK_TYPE_CollectResourcePickable suitabilities.

Product_Farm_wheat.description: Use it to grow ingredients for <itemName id=|Pan|/>. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Seeding, COMMON_WORK_TYPE_Watering, and COMMON_WORK_TYPE_CollectResourcePickable suitabilities.

Product_Ingot_Grade_02_Iron.description: Uses <itemName id=|CopperOre|/> and <itemName id=|Coal|/> to produce <itemName id=|IronIngot|/>s.

Product_Medicine_Grade_01.description: Can produce simple medicine. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_ProductMedicine trait.

Product_Medicine_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but can produce higher-quality medicine. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_ProductMedicine trait.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_01.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Made from stone, the efficiency is questionable.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_02.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Made from metal, its durability and efficiency have improved. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_03.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Its durability and efficiency have further improved. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Product_StationDeforest.description: Can produce wood at a base. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Deforest trait.

Product_StonePit.description: Can produce stone at a base. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Mining trait.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_01.description: Produces simple mechanical weapons. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft Ability.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at a faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft trait.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft trait.

Product_WorkBench_SkillUnlock.description: Produces items that allow Pals to use Partner Skills.

RifleBullet.description: Ammo for <itemName id=|SingleShotRifle|/> and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

RoughBullet.description: Ammo for <itemName id=|Musket|/>, <itemName id=|MakeshiftHandgun|/> and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Shield_01.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.

Shield_02.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. The new model has been improved, enhancing its defense. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/>.

Shield_03.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Modifications have enhanced its effectiveness even further. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/>.

Shield_04.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Through repeated testing, the highest quality has been achieved. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/>.

Shield_05.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. As a result of further experiments, ultimate quality has been achieved. Can be made at <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_03|/>.

ShotGunBullet.description: Ammo for shotguns and other similar weapons. Requires <mapObjectName id=|WeaponFactory_Dirty_01|/> to craft.

Spa.description: Pals recover SAN while in a <mapObjectName id=|Spa|/>.

Spa2.description: Pals recover plenty of SAN while in the hot spring.

Spear_2.description: Useful for close-range combat. The metal tip give it an increased attack power. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_01|/> to craft.

Spear_3.description: Useful for close-range combat. The high-quality metal tip give it an increased attack power. Requires <mapObjectName id=|Factory_Hard_02|/> to craft.

Special_HatchingPalEgg.description: Place a Pal Egg inside to incubate it.

Special_PalRankUp.description: Combines several Pals of the same type to create a higher-ranked version.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_01.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. This basic model is only effective on low level Pals.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_02.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Its capabilities have been improved, allowing it to catch a wider range of Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_01|/> to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_03.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Able to capture moderately powerful Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_01|/> to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_04.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Enhanced capabilities allow it to capture even more powerful Pals. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_02|/> to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_05.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Not many Pals can escape its highly efficient design. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_03|/> to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_06.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Very few Pals can escape its perfected design. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_03|/> to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_07.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Almost no Pals can escape its flawless design. Requires <mapObjectName id=|SphereFactory_Black_03|/> to craft.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_01.description: Produces Spheres for capturing Pals. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_02.description: Creates <itemName id=|PalSphere|/>s at a faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_03.description: Creates <itemName id=|PalSphere|/>s at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability.

Stone_Gate.description: Stone gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Stone_houseset.description: Set for building bases using stone. Allows building of stone foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Torch.description: Place it at a base to light the surrounding area.

Trap_LegHold.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on small Pals or humans.

Trap_LegHold_Big.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on large Pals.

Trap_MineElecShock.description: Electrocutes those who step on it. Electrocuted Pals are easier to capture.

Trap_MineFreeze.description: Freezes those who step on it. Frozen Pals are easier to capture.

Trap_Noose.description: Catches Pals that pass through. Only effective on small Pals and humans.

WallTorch.description: Place it on a wall to light the surrounding area.

Wood_Gate.description: Wooden gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Wooden_houseset.description: Set for building bases using wood. Allows building of wooden foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Workbench.description: <mapObjectName id=|WorkBench|/> for producing simple items. Pals with COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_Handcraft suitability help speed up production.
